Key Match Events: Gerhard Erasmus top scores with 52 as Namibia set Scotland 156 to win
Michael Leask and Richie Berrington impress as Scots win by five wickets
Michael Leask and Richie Berrington put on 74 runs from 42 balls for the fifth wicket
Richie Berrington smashes it back past David Weise and into hospitality for six big runs to win the match
Michael Leask named player of the match for his performance
Post-Match Reflections: Scotland keeper Matthew Cross comments on the win and upcoming games
Losing captain Gerhard Erasmus reflects on Namibia's loss
Michael Leask expresses his feelings on being named player of the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Scotland's opening game against England was washed out
Namibia beat Oman in their first match
Scotland now take on Oman on Sunday night; a win would give them a superb chance of qualifying for the Super 8s
